original_text:
“I saw in the night visions,
and behold, with the clouds of heaven
    there came one like a son of man,
and he came to the Ancient of Days
    and was presented before him.
korean_text: 내가 또 밤 환상 중에 보니 인자 같은 이가 하늘 구름을 타고 와서 옛적부터 항상 계신 이에게 나아가 그 앞으로 인도되매

sentences.original_text: I saw in the night visions
with the clouds of heaven there came one like a son of man
sentences.korean_translation: 하늘의 구름을 타고 인자 같은 이가 오셨는데

sentences.original_text: and he came to the Ancient of Days
